alert.note: Alert for Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 29 at 2:52PM MDT until July 29 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dry wash and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall. Water and some debris is impacting travel on US 6 near mile marker 197.5 * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following county, Utah. * WHEN...Until 445 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 248 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain impacting travel on US6 due to thunderstorms. This will cause dry wash and small stream flooding, and flooding in poor drainage areas in the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of South Central Utah County
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
